column4: Hello. I restored my files from a backup, now, all folders are owned by root, but the files inside are owned by me. So, How do I change the owner of a folder but not the files inside it, because they are already the correct owner.
You will have to use "sudo chown FolderNameHere" for each folder
Like, sudo chown Blender.  Just like that?
How do chown will know what type of owner is going to change?
